main event: On October 26, 1959, a mortician in Mobile, Alabama observed a large round unidentified flying object with a tail resembling a comet.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 seconds., The object was described as silver with a whitish glow., The object was observed at a 60-degree elevation and appeared to fly in a sharp arc., The observer estimated the object was about 3 miles away and flying at an altitude of 3 to 4 miles., The report indicates that the object's speed and description are typical of a meteor.
sighted object: large round glowing object with a trailing tail
